briefdescription.para: Gets the current time from CFE.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Queries the CFE TIME services and retieves the Current time

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This routine stores the time in SC_AppData

briefdescription.para: Computes an absolute time from relative time.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function computes an absolute time from 'now' and the relative time passed into the function

parameterdescription.para: The relative time to compute from

para.verbatim: This function compares two absolutes time.

entry.para: Returns TRUE if AbsTime1 is greater than AbsTime2
Returns FALSE if AbsTime1 is less than AbsTime2

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will check if the actual length of a software bus command message matches the expected length and send an error event message if a mismatch occurs

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message based upon the command code

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the length is as expected
Returns FALSE if the length is not as expected
